trans-unit.source: Contains information about a part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> at a specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre uma parte do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> em uma coordenada especificada.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> class, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, is used to determine which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> classe, junto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controlar, é usado para determinar qual parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controle o usuário clicou.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> class contains the row, column, and part of the grid that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> classe contém a linha, coluna e parte da grade que foi clicada.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType> enumeration returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A> property for a complete list of grid parts.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType> enumeração retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A> propriedade para obter uma lista de partes de grade.

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>, invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>, invocar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controle.

trans-unit.source: Pass the `x` and `y` properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Passar o `x` e `y` propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event to return the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> evento para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The row, column, and part of the grid are then printed.
trans-unit.target: Parte da grade, linha e coluna, em seguida, são impressas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of the column the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número da coluna em que o usuário clicou.

trans-unit.source: The number of the column.
trans-unit.target: O número da coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the coordinate is not a cell, the property returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se a coordenada não é uma célula, a propriedade retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the numbers of the clicked row and column by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime os números da linha clicada coluna chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método de dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: This returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Isso retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O segundo objeto a ser comparado, digitado como <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: Indica se dois objetos são idênticos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example tests whether the user is clicking an area of the grid that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir testa se o usuário é clicar em uma área da grade que não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash para a instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the hash code of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime o código hash do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a coordinate corresponds to part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control that is not functioning.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma coordenada corresponde a uma parte do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> que não está funcionando.

trans-unit.source: Other parts of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType.Caption>, can return useful information.
trans-unit.target: Outras partes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType.Caption>, podem retornar informações úteis.

trans-unit.source: If the part of the grid has no function (such as the gray area behind a sparsely populated grid table), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Nowhere> field is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se a parte da grade não tem nenhuma função (como a área cinza atrás de uma tabela de modo disperso preenchida grade), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Nowhere> campo é retornado.

trans-unit.source: The following example tests whether the user is clicking an area of the grid that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir testa se o usuário é clicar em uma área da grade que não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of the row the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número da linha em que o usuário clicou.

trans-unit.source: The number of the clicked row.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha clicada.

trans-unit.source: If the coordinate is not a cell, the property returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se a coordenada não é uma célula, a propriedade retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: If the coordinate is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType.RowHeader>, the property returns the row number of the header, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Column%2A> property will return -1.
trans-unit.target: Se a coordenada é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType.RowHeader>, a propriedade retorna o número de linha de cabeçalho, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Column%2A> propriedade retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the number of the clicked row and column by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime o número da linha clicada coluna chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método de dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: This returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Isso retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type, row number, and column number.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo, o número da linha e o número da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The type, row number, and column number.
trans-unit.target: O tipo, o número da linha e o número da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the type, row number, and column number when the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime o tipo, o número de linha e o número de coluna quando o usuário clica o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control, other than the row or column, that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a parte do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />, que não a linha ou coluna, que foi clicada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType" /> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: Uma das enumerações de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the clicked part of the grid by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime a parte clicada da grade chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> método de dentro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: This returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Isso retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> objeto.
